required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Study of External Neuromodulation to Improve Signs and Symptoms of Dry Eye in Visual Display Terminal Users
clinical_study.official_title: A Randomized Sham Controlled Study of External Neuromodulation to Improve Signs and Symptoms of Dry Eye in Visual Display Terminal Users

brief_summary.textblock: Two study arms - sham and treatment; There will be a cross over of the sham group to the treatment group at day 15.

detailed_description.textblock:
This is a post market study. The active device will be the FDA cleared device used within its labeling. The sham group will receive an iTEAR device which looks identical to and makes noise similar to a fully functional iTEAR device but has a tip that does not vibrate. All subjects in the sham group will crossover to the treatment group after 2 two weeks and all patients will continue to 30 days.
The study will be conducted at up to 5 sites in the United States. It will enroll 30 subjects for 30 days.
This is a double-masked study with 10 subjects receiving sham and 20 subjects receiving treatment. The subjects and the examining investigators are masked to treatment until the crossover.

study_design_info.intervention_model_description: Day 14-30, all subjects receive therapy device
study_design_info.masking_description: Sham device produces noise but no stimulation energy. Assessor does not know which device the subject received. The subject does not know which device he or she received

primary_outcome.description: Change in gland expression from meibomian glands
Change in the basal output of tears

secondary_outcome.description: Incidence of Events which prevent device usage

clinical_study.condition: Visual Display Users With Previously Undiagnosed Dry Eye

arm_group.description: This arm will receive a function iTEAR
This arm will receive sham treatment device

intervention.description: Neurostimulation external nasal nerve to stimulate tear production

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- > 6hrs visual display terminal
- OSDI > 13
- One of: SChirmer < 10, One quadrant staining > 2, or Meibomian Gland expression <12
Exclusion Criteria:
- Opinion of investigator that subject not be in the study

patient_data.ipd_description: All results will be shared at conclusion of last follow up visit
